abstracts.cdata!:
The Electricity Expansion Project
            consists of: rehabilitation and expansion of ECG's
            distribution systems in four main cities and in 16 smaller
            urban centers; construction of 33/11 kv overhead
            transmission lines; purchase of meters, service and
            construction vehicles, tools and testing equipment, and
            engineering and management consultant services.
